amendment.description: To allow States to use funding under part A of title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to replicate and expand successful practices from high-performing public schools.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2181 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2181 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 2089.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2181 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2181 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 2089.
